title: Tureen And Cover, 1858–63
markings: TB&S in shield [for Thomas Bradbury and Son] on bottom, also S and V [workmen's marks ?]
inscribed: Bright-cut crest of crown with lion emerging from top with arms raised.
description: Boat-shaped with stepped oval base; bowl and cover with four raised segmented divisions; urn-shaped finial; high looped handles; threaded upper edge on bowl; bright-cut crest of lion and crown on bowl and cover

tombstone.epitaph:
Tureen And Cover, 1858–63.
1858–63. Copper, silver. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-3-a,b.
